name: Dsl-tao
tagline: A Tool for pattern-based construction of DSLs
body:
### DSL-tao: Engineering scalable DSLs using patterns.

DSL-tao is a prototype tool for engineering scalable DSLs using patterns. It is being built with funding from the EU project MONDO (http://www.mondo-project.eu).

### Contributors

DSL-tao is contributed by: @apescador, @antoniogarmendia, @jdelara
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
